content:
TITLE: Setting environment variables for Mattermost
DESCRIPTION: These environment variables are required for the plugin to communicate with the Mattermost server during local development. They configure the site URL, admin username, and admin password.
SOURCE: https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-plugin-cloud/blob/master/README.md#_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: shell
CODE:
```
export MM_SERVICESETTINGS_SITEURL=http://localhost:8065
export MM_ADMIN_USERNAME=<your-sysadmin-username>
export MM_ADMIN_PASSWORD=<your-sysadmin-password>
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Creating a webhook for local development (mattermost-cloud)
DESCRIPTION: This command creates a webhook from your local cloud provisioning server to your local Mattermost server. The webhook allows the provisioning server to send notifications and updates to Mattermost.
SOURCE: https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-plugin-cloud/blob/master/README.md#_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: shell
CODE:
```
cloud webhook create --owner cloud-plugin --url http://localhost:8065/plugins/com.mattermost.cloud/webhook
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Releasing a major change for cloud plugin
DESCRIPTION: This command releases a major change for the Mattermost Cloud plugin.  It automates the process of creating a release with significant updates or breaking changes.
SOURCE: https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-plugin-cloud/blob/master/README.md#_snippet_4

LANGUAGE: shell
CODE:
```
make major
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Releasing a minor change for cloud plugin
DESCRIPTION: This command releases a minor change for the Mattermost Cloud plugin.  It automates the process of creating a release with new features and enhancements.
SOURCE: https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-plugin-cloud/blob/master/README.md#_snippet_3

LANGUAGE: shell
CODE:
```
make minor
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Releasing a patch change for cloud plugin
DESCRIPTION: This command releases a patch change for the Mattermost Cloud plugin.  It automates the process of creating a release with minor bug fixes.
SOURCE: https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-plugin-cloud/blob/master/README.md#_snippet_2

LANGUAGE: shell
CODE:
```
make patch
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Releasing a major release candidate for cloud plugin
DESCRIPTION: This command releases a major release candidate for the Mattermost Cloud plugin.  It automates the process of creating a release candidate for significant updates or breaking changes.
SOURCE: https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-plugin-cloud/blob/master/README.md#_snippet_7

LANGUAGE: shell
CODE:
```
make major-rc
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Releasing a minor release candidate for cloud plugin
DESCRIPTION: This command releases a minor release candidate for the Mattermost Cloud plugin.  It automates the process of creating a release candidate for new features and enhancements.
SOURCE: https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-plugin-cloud/blob/master/README.md#_snippet_6

LANGUAGE: shell
CODE:
```
make minor-rc
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Releasing a patch release candidate for cloud plugin
DESCRIPTION: This command releases a patch release candidate for the Mattermost Cloud plugin.  It automates the process of creating a release candidate for minor bug fixes.
SOURCE: https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-plugin-cloud/blob/master/README.md#_snippet_5

LANGUAGE: shell
CODE:
```
make patch-rc
```
